name: Using The Loo
description:
It's been a good day, when a moment of dread suddenly threatens all you hold dear if you don't act on it in time. What will you do?

My first project using Twine, written on the 5th/6th of February 2016. I hope you enjoy it.

WARNING: Contains a bit of bad language in it.

NOTE: QI and Jonathan Creek are property of the BBC. I do not own them, and no copyright infringement is intended.
